backend/overview.title: Backend Overview
backend/overview.description: The Nastrih.cz backend is built using Spring Boot 3.2.2, providing a robust and scalable REST API for the barbershop booking system.

deployment/ci-cd.title: CI/CD Pipeline
deployment/ci-cd.description: Nastrih.cz uses GitHub Actions for continuous integration and deployment. The project is set up with automated workflows for testing, building, and deploying all components.

frontend/overview.title: Frontend Overview
frontend/overview.description: The Nastrih.cz frontend is built using Next.js 14 with the App Router, providing a modern and performant user interface for the barbershop booking system.

guides/admin-panel.title: Admin Panel Documentation
guides/admin-panel.description: This document provides comprehensive information about the admin panel in the Nastrih.cz booking system.

guides/booking-flow.title: Booking Flow Documentation
guides/booking-flow.description: This document describes the booking flow in the Nastrih.cz barbershop booking system.

guides/components.title: Components Documentation
guides/components.description: This document provides detailed information about the reusable components in the Nastrih.cz project.

guides/getting-started.title: Getting Started
guides/getting-started.description: This guide will help you set up and run the Nastrih.cz barbershop booking system locally.

guides/README.title: Nastrih.cz Documentation
guides/README.description: Welcome to the Nastrih.cz documentation! This guide will help you understand and work with the Nastrih.cz barbershop booking system.

guides/theme-system.title: Theme System Documentation
guides/theme-system.description: The Nastrih.cz booking system includes a powerful theming system that allows for complete customization of the booking interface. This document explains how the theme system works and how to use it.

intro.title: Tutorial Intro
intro.description: Let's discover Docusaurus in less than 5 minutes.

tutorial-basics/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.title: Create a Blog Post
tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

tutorial-basics/create-a-document.title: Create a Document
tutorial-basics/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

tutorial-basics/create-a-page.title: Create a Page
tutorial-basics/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

tutorial-basics/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
tutorial-basics/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.title: Manage Docs Versions
tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.
